subject: Hi Alsu
body:
Hi Alsu,
I’m getting in touch because we provide companies like Lcw with fast funding for working capital and lines of credit, ranging from $150K–800K at just 1% per month.

We offer funding without personal guarantees and don’t run any credit checks. Approval and funding can happen within as little as 24 hours, sometimes even on the same day.

Is this something that benefit you right now, Alsu? Just reply when you have 5–10 min to connect.

Regards,
Oliver Adams
Account Manager
Flex Group

subject: Hey Alsu,
body:
Hey Alsu,
Last week, we secured funding for another company from with access to $440K, getting them approved the same day they submitted the application.

No personal liability or credit checks.

Our rates are as low as 1% per month for businesses like yours.

Have you explored for capital solutions for Lcw, Alsu?

Regards,
Oliver Adams
Account Manager
Flex Group

subject: Re: Alsu - check this
body:
Hey Alsu,
Just touching base to see if you can use a line of credit or some working capital for Lcw. We have available funds that we can approve within 24–48 hours, without personal guarantees.

We can do this completely based on revenue—without looking at profit. We typically qualify businesses for amounts between $150K–500K, at just 1% per month.

Want to take a few minutes to explore this? I’m open for a quick call today.

Have a great day,
Oliver Adams
Account Manager
Flex Group

On Tue, March 11, 2025 3:03 PM, Oliver Adams 

[oliver.adam@amerirensolvrs.co]> wrote:

> Hi Alsu,
> I thought I’d connect to see if Lcw is currently looking for any immediate lines of credit. We can secure for you up to $350K, with fast approvals.
> 
> We provide capital with no personal guarantees or credit checks, and we qualify companies just based on revenue (not profit).
> 
> Our rates begin at 1% per month.
> 
> Would it be helpful to hop on a brief discussion, Alsu?
> 
> Enjoy the rest of your day,
> Oliver Adams
> Account Manager
> Flex Group

> [oliver.adam@amerirensolvrs.co]> wrote:
> 
> > Hi Alsu,
> > If we could help Lcw with immediate access to $100K–450K at just 1% per month, would it be helpful?
> > 
> > I’m asking because we offer same-day funding with zero personal liability and no hard inquiries for businesses like yours.
> > 
> > Are you currently searching capital solutions for Lcw, Alsu?
> > 
> > Kind regards,
> > Oliver Adams
> > Account Manager
> > Flex Group
> > On Mon, February 24, 2025 2:07 PM, Oliver Adams 

> > [oliver.adam@amerirensolvrs.co]> wrote:
> > 
> > > Hi Alsu,
> > > I’m contacting you because we secure companies like Lcw with immediate access to working capital and lines of credit, ranging from $150K–650K at just 1% per month.
> > > 
> > > We don’t ask for personal guarantees and don’t require any credit checks. Can approve and fund within 24–48 hours, sometimes even within hours.
> > > 
> > > Would this be something that be useful for you right now, Alsu? Just reply when you have 5–10 min to discuss.
> > > 
> > > Regards,

subject: Don’t Miss Out! A New Era of Employee Benefits: The Hartford & Workday Wellness
body:
Sign-up today!
  
  
 
 
 
  
View as a webpage 
  
  
  
  
  
Sign‑up today for our 60‑minute session 
  
A New Era of Employee Benefits:
The Hartford & Workday Wellness 
  
Monday, March 17, 2025 
11:00 AM – 12:00 PM EST 
  
 
  
Register Today 
  
  
  
  
Join us as leaders from The Hartford and Workday unveil how our new tailored solutions and strategic integrations meet the unique needs of today’s workforce. Tune in to: 
  
 
•
Find out how the Workday Wellness experience helps provide personalized wellbeing offerings that can promote healthier and happier workplaces. 
  
 
•
Explore the industry leading benefits for employers who work with The Hartford and Workday for their benefits administration. 
  
 
•
Learn more about our flexible HR Tech solutions, consultative approach, and strategic platform connections. 
  
We’re honored to be one of the first benefits carriers to offer these innovative experiences and look forward to having you join us for this exciting moment of collaboration between The Hartford and Workday. 
  
  
  
  
Meet the Speakers 
  
 
  
Mike Fish 
Head of Employee Benefits at The Hartford 
  
  
 
  
Laura Marzi 
Chief Marketing Officer for Employee Benefits at The Hartford 
  
  
 
  
Saqib Sheikh 
VP, Partner Strategy & Business Development at Workday 
  
  
Register Today 
  
  
  
  
 
 
With 12+ years of integration experience with Workday, we're committed to flexible and innovative solutions to support employees' well-being, while making managing workforces easier.
1
 
  
  
  
Privacy Policy 
  
Contact Us 
  
Unsubscribe 
  
  
 
  
 
  
 
  
Links to sites unaffiliated with The Hartford are provided for users’ convenience only. The Hartford is not responsible for and makes no representation or warranty regarding the contents, completeness or accuracy or security of any materials on such sites. If you decide to access such non‑Hartford sites, you do so at your own risk. 
  
1
Based on The Hartford’s internal data as of December 2024 
  
This email message is an insurance advertisement.

Hartford Fire Insurance Company: CA DOI License Number: 07268

®
, and is headquartered at One Hartford Plaza, Hartford, CT 06155. For additional details, please read The Hartford's legal notice at 
www.thehartford.com
.

subject: Alsu - check this
body:
Hi Alsu,
I thought I’d connect to see if Lcw is currently looking for any immediate lines of credit. We can secure for you up to $350K, with fast approvals.

We provide capital with no personal guarantees or credit checks, and we qualify companies just based on revenue (not profit).

Our rates begin at 1% per month.

Would it be helpful to hop on a brief discussion, Alsu?

Enjoy the rest of your day,
Oliver Adams
Account Manager
Flex Group
